data.title: Convenience/Recycle Center Information
data.text:
RECYCLING DROP-OFF CENTER

(A) Aluminum Cans (O) Oil

(B) Bi-Metal Cans (P) Plastic

(C) Cardboard (N) Newspaper

(G) Glass (Y) Yard Waste

(AF) Anti-Freeze (M) Magazines

Note: A permit is needed for the disposal of Household Waste at all Convenience Centers. Recyclables are accepted at all Convenience Centers, with the exception of Electronics which are accepted at the Newland Park Landfill location only. All Convenience Centers except Newland Park are CLOSED on TUESDAYS AND THURSDAYS.

**Batteries, Oyster Shells, Oil Filters & Propane Tanks are accepted at all Convenience Centers**

For All Convenience Centers Holiday Hours please contact the main office @ 410-548-4935.

ALL Recycling Centers accept A.B.C.G.P.N.M.

24 hour Recycling Centers are located at:

Delmar: 29750 Foskey Ln

Fruitland: 27778 Walnut Tree Rd

Jersey Rd: 1130 Jersey Rd

Pittsville: 7478 Perdue St
